section.name: Prerequisites
section.p: A FileManager service requires access to the following other AstroGrid components.

subsection.name: Registry
subsection.p: In order to access other AstroGrid sevices, FileManager will need access to at least one Registry service.
In addition, you will need access to a publishing Registry to register the FileManager service.

subsection.name: FileStore
subsection.p: The FileManager service will need access to at least one FileStore service to act as the default storage location.
